name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution 
A butcher shop in Xinjiang

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 25, at the invitation of Xi Jinping, the President of the Republic of Peru, Dina Hercilia Boruarte Segarra, paid a state visit to China and held talks with COSCO SHIPPING.
In 2019, COSCO SHIPPING bought 60% of the shares of Peru's Chancay Port and obtained exclusive operating rights. It has become the largest project of the Belt and Road Initiative in Peru. At present, COSCO SHIPPING has invested nearly 10 billion yuan in the project.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 20, greatFire and ACTECTE 19 released a report on the impact of Apple's cooperation with China's censorship system on human rights.
The report pointed out that Apple is currently cooperating with Chinese officials to increase digital freedom and censorship. Since April 19, 2024, Apple has removed WhatsApp and Instagram from the Chinese App Store on the grounds of national security and in accordance with the strict regulations of the Chinese government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 24, a food delivery man in Haizhu, Guangzhou, was stopped by traffic police and collapsed on the spot, shouting, "I'm done for if I exceed the time limit!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 25, in Chancheng District, Foshan, Guangdong, a woman hit an ununiformed law enforcement officer while defending her electric bike, and was then punched by the other party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 25, Guangzhou. A man took his child who had a fever of 39℃ to the hospital, but was stopped by traffic police and his car was impounded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 25, several men beat gongs, held banners and used loudspeakers to protest against parking fees in Yuyuan Village, Foshan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 25, the Economic Observer reported that many places have seen a wave of elderly people leaving nursing homes.
Many nursing homes said that the main reason is that people have fewer opportunities to work outside and are unemployed at home, so they choose to take the elderly back home for care.
